评论概述: an awesome women’s vintage luxury wristwatch
评论详情: among several other items in a birthday gift package, I chose this rose, gold, vintage luxury diamond stainless steel strap watch for my daughter. She adored it as she liked the rose gold color and the steel color combination. She has the Apple Watch but she like this to wear on special occasions as it looks classic. The frame the strap or embedded with diamonds which appear to be authentic the watch also has the third arm for seconds, which gives it a beautiful look as well. The glass is also quite solid and would not break easily, and it has the appearance of a diamond as well. It’s quite easy to adjust the size of the strap and this reminds me of the good old days where these straps would have spare links to be removed to fit a hand. I haven’t tried it. It’s waterproofing Quality, but it says it is waterproof to adapt of 100 feet although this watch may never see that depth unless it falls in water accidentally, but it may not stop working if it gets into water while washing hands, etc. or in rain it’s a great value for the money looks awesome and gives great personality look.

Watch is a lot shinier and better in person. it comes in a nice sleek black box with a certification card inside. The dial part of watch is what really makes this watch look elegant. The pink is so soft in color it actually can be confused to a crystal-like material. This is the first watch I've had that came with the screw to do manual adjustments to watch size. For me, that is the most efficient thing to have because i have incredibly small wrist and because of this tool i was able to get the perfect fix.  The fit is like an average watch with similar materials. I do think velvet bands and leather bands tend to be more comfortable but this watch is just honestly perfect because of how it looks.

评论概述: OK Watch for this Price Category
评论详情: I got the rose gold watch with the green face.  What drew me to this watch was the angled cuts on the face cover.  I thought it would add glisten along with sparkle from the crystals surrounding it. Neither add glisten or sparkle so it's a bit of a let down.  Don't get me wrong, it's pretty it just doesn't have the appeal I thought it would.  The clasp is nice and I think it's a nice touch that a band sizing tool is included.  Overall, it's a decent watch for under $20 but I don't think anyone is going to think you paid much more.
The watch is really super pretty. I haven't worn it yet so I can't attest to it's ability to keep time well. If it get poopy then I'll come back and update.

These women’s analog watches offer a blend of timeless elegance and modern functionality. The simple dial and classic numerals make it easy to read the time at a glance, while the sleek band materials—often stainless steel or leather—add a touch of refinement. Unlike digital counterparts, analog faces impart a more traditional and sophisticated feel that can enhance any outfit. Many models are built with quality components, resulting in reliable timekeeping and durable construction that stands the test of daily wear. They’re also versatile enough to be worn in both professional and casual settings, making them a great staple piece. Some even include subtle extras like a date window or water resistance, adding practicality to their timeless style. Overall, these women’s analog watches deliver both fashion and function, making them worthy of investment.

I don’t typically wear watches that often, so when I do I like to have a pretty one on hand (or on wrist, ba-dum-psh). I love the rose gold with the emerald face, the colors are very rich and beautiful. It also has a heft to it that makes me feel like it’s good quality, though I’m no expert. My only small issue was with the size. It was too loose on my wrist, but thankfully it came with instructions and a little tool for taking links out of the band, so I was able to resize it myself. Now it fits, but it still just looks big on me. It could just be me though, from a combination of having small wrists and never owning a watch this size. But I like it!

评论概述: Great looking watch for the price point!
评论详情: I'm really happy with my NIBOSI Women's Square Green Dial Watch for Women! It's a great watch for the price, and it's very stylish and versatile.  The watch has a square green dial with gold-tone hands and markers. The band is made of stainless steel and is adjustable to fit most wrist sizes. The watch is also water resistant to 30 meters, so you can wear it while swimming or washing your hands.  I love the green dial of the watch. It's a unique and eye-catching color that is sure to turn heads. The watch is also very comfortable to wear, and the band is easy to adjust.  I've been wearing the watch for a few weeks now, and I've received a lot of compliments on it. It's a great watch for everyday wear, and it can also be dressed up for special occasions.  All in all, I highly recommend the NIBOSI Women's Square Green Dial Watch for Women. It's a great watch for the price, and it's very stylish and versatile!
The sparkly prism that the face leaves on everything when the sun hits it is enough to make me instantly fall in love. But it’s also comfortable, well made, beautiful, and reliable.

This watch is very nice. It's elegant, has a really beautiful face that just goes together really well. It works, it tells time well and is accurate once set. This can be worn on an everyday use, it is waterproof in rain and with washing hands. I liked it a lot, the band did start it get a little uncomfortable after while, but other than that, I really like it.

评论概述: Fits my slightly larger than average wrist but it's snug
评论详情: This watch is actually a lot more petite than I was expecting. The band is narrow, and the watch face is small. That's not a complaint because it's a refreshing change and it's a beautiful watch. I got the green to go with my emerald jewelry and just because it seems like a unique color that I don't see a lot in watches. The clasp is dual deployment, meaning you will have to fold it and press it closed from the left, then repeat on the right. Usually I see single deployment clasps on watches so this is also slightly different. My wrist is slightly larger than average and this watch closes, but it is snug and I wish it had the option to add another link.
Cute watch- a little big, but fits well enough

评论概述: My wife has several watches.  This watch is her favorite, it is so beautiful!
评论详情: For a watch that costs embarrassingly little, this watch is striking, gorgeous and elegant. My wife has been wearing it often despite the fact that every other watch she owns cost more and sometimes WAY MORE. She is complimented on this NIBOSI watch all the time at work.  I asked her to tell me if there was anything she wanted me to mention that might be negative about the watch. Her reply was, "Nothing negative, it keeps perfect time, the band is really comfortable, it fits perfectly and it looks like it cost a lot more."  Seems like she has found a favorite watch, with no apparent faults, that has to be a FIVE STAR!

The overall design and features of the watch impressed me, I have to admit that there was one aspect that fell short of my expectations.  The 24mm rose gold stainless steel case and sunray dial, combined with the delicate Roman numerals, certainly give the watch a sophisticated look. The quartz movement with three-hand display and date window ensures accurate time display, which is essential for my busy schedule.  However, the size of the diamonds on the dial dampened my excitement a bit. Upon closer inspection, I noticed that they were quite small and didn't have the impact I expected. I think larger diamonds add more shine and enhance the overall luxury look of the watch.  Despite this small drawback, I still find this watch very charming and versatile, perfectly complementing a variety of outfits. The rose gold stainless steel bracelet is always comfortable on my wrist, and the double latch deployant clasp ensures a secure fit.  The durability of the watch is commendable with the hard mineral crystal glass effectively resisting scratches. This characteristic is essential to maintain the perfect look of the watch over time.  The water resistance adds a touch of practicality to the watch. While it can withstand splashes and short-term immersion, I would appreciate a higher water-resistance rating to wear it with confidence during water-intensive activities.

This watch it absolutely beautiful! It’s super easy to get on and off by yourself and it fit me perfectly! It comes with a tool to remove links if you need to. The only thing I’d say is it might not fit those with larger wrists. I have small to medium sized wrists and if it were one or two links smaller, it wouldn’t have fit me. So just keep that in mind before purchasing if you have larger wrists! Other than that, I love it and it’s so pretty!

With that, not very giftable, but it's still a good watch to keep for yourself.

评论概述: Beautiful watch, but doesn't keep time
评论详情: Absolutely gorgeous watch, but by the 3rd day the time was off. Tried adjusting the time to reset it, but the minute hand doesn't move.
